test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-2 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-3 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-6 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-7
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-7 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S") le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-8
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-8 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S") le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-9 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") le xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-10
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than2args-10 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") le xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-3 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 17, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function that return true and used together with fn:not (gt operator) *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not((xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT12H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P14DT11H")))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function that return true and used together with fn:not (ge operator) *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT11H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT10H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function that return false and used together with fn:not (gt operator) *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P08DT10H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P9DT09H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-6 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function that return false and used together with fn:not(ge operator) *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P07DT09H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P09DT09H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-7
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-7 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "and" expression (gt operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT09H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P09DT10H")) and (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT01H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P08DT06H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-8
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-8 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "and" expression (ge operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT09H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT01H")) and (xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT04H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P09DT07H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-9 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "or" expression (gt operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT08H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT07H")) or (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT09H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT09H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-10
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-10 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "or" expression (ge operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT01H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P09DT06H")) or (xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT01H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT04H"))

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-11
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-11 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "fn:true"/or expression (gt operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT02H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P01DT10H")) or (fn:true())

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-12
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-12 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "fn:true"/or expression (ge operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT01H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P09DT05H")) or (fn:true())

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-13
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-13 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "fn:false"/or expression (gt operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P30DT10H") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P01DT02H")) or (fn:false())

test-case.name: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-14
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-14 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 15, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "dayTimeDuration-greater-than" function used together with "fn:false"/or expression (ge operator). *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT05H") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P20DT10H")) or (fn:false())

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-1
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.143S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationGT-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'gt' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************
test-case.test: not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S"))

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationGT-3 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'gt' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************
test-case.test: not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S") gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.145S"))

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-4
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.143S") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.143S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-5
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.143S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationGT-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationGT-6 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'ge' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************
test-case.test: not(xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.143S") ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT08H34M12.144S"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-001
test-case.description: test comparison of dayTimeDurations
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; not(local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-002
test-case.description: test comparison of dayTimeDurations
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; not(local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-003
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; exists(local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:true()) gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-004
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:false()) gt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D")

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-005
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; exists(local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:true()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-greater-than-006
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:false()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-greater-equal-001
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(false()) ge xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-greater-equal-002
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) ge xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-greater-equal-003
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-greater-equal-004
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(true()) ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D")

test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") ge local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-greater-equal-006
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") ge local:f(true())

test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") ge local:f(false())

test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") ge local:f(true())

test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded greater equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
